I think it's C. Determine the expected duration of the rework with any associated quality control activities and add the duration to an updated version of the WBS.

Before taking any action, the project manager should determine the expected duration of the rework, including any additional quality control activities that may be necessary. This will allow for a more accurate schedule update and prevent further delays. Once the expected duration of the rework has been determined, it should be added to an updated version of the WBS to reflect the changes in the project schedule.
